words.def: a material effigy that is worshipped
any of a class of alcohols having 2 hydroxyl groups in each molecule
a recreational facility including a swimming pool for water sports
either of two folds of skin that can be moved to cover or open the eye
past times (especially in the phrase `in days of old')
a slippery or viscous liquid or liquefiable substance not miscible with water
a state in the Rocky Mountains
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
